title: Sandstone

properties.value: Sandstone is an item that can only be mined from sandstone rocks at the Western desert mining site (Quarry) south of the Bandit Camp in the Kharidian Desert. In the quarry, as in the desert, desert heat will continually reduce the player's Hitpoints unless the player has waterskins in the inventory or wears the Desert amulet 4.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Sandstone
This article is about the item. For the rock which the item comes from, see Sandstone rock.

SMW Subobject for 1kgHigh Alchemy value: 0Buy limit: 100Examine: A tiny chunk of sandstone.Is members only: trueIs variant of: SandstoneImage: File:Sandstone (1kg).pngUses infobox: ItemWeight: 1.000Value: 1Version anchor: 1kgRelease date: 23 January 2006Item ID: 6971

Sandstone is an item that can only be mined from sandstone rocks at the Western desert mining site (Quarry) south of the Bandit Camp in the Kharidian Desert. In the quarry, as in the desert, desert heat will continually reduce the player's Hitpoints unless the player has waterskins in the inventory or wears the Desert amulet 4.

Sandstone respawns quickly, so a player can mine continuously at a group of only 3-4 rocks. Thus, it can be quickly mined for fast XP. When sandstone is mined, the player randomly receives one of the four sizes of sandstone blocks.

Sandstone is used in the quest Enakhra's Lament to make part of Lazim's statue: 32kg for the base, and 20kg for the body.

Un-noted sandstone can be converted into buckets of sand using the Sandstorm grinder, found west of the Quarry. The amount of sand produced per sandstone varies, though it is more efficient (and time consuming) to grind smaller blocks of sandstone. This comes at the cost of 50gp per bucket of sand produced, and the player is required to supply their own (noted or un-noted) buckets.

A player must have a Mining level of 35 or greater to mine sandstone, which yields the following experience depending on the size the sandstone block mined:

Size XP Examine text Buckets of Sand (Grinder)
1 kg 30 A tiny chunk of sandstone. 1
2 kg 40 A small chunk of sandstone. 2
5 kg 50 A medium-sized chunk of sandstone. 4
10 kg 60 A large chunk of sandstone. 8

'''Sandstone''' is an item that can only be mined from [[sandstone rock]]s at the [[Western desert mining site]] (Quarry) south of the [[Bandit Camp (Kharidian Desert)|Bandit Camp]] in the [[Kharidian Desert]]. In the quarry, as in the desert, [[desert heat]] will continually reduce the player's [[Hitpoints]] unless the player has [[waterskin]]s in the inventory or wears the [[Desert amulet 4]].

Sandstone respawns quickly, so a player can mine continuously at a group of only 3-4 rocks. Thus, it can be quickly mined for fast XP. When sandstone is mined, the player randomly receives one of the four sizes of sandstone blocks.

Sandstone is used in the quest [[Enakhra's Lament]] to make part of [[Lazim]]'s statue: 32kg for the base, and 20kg for the body.

Un-noted sandstone can be converted into [[Bucket of sand|buckets of sand]] using the [[Sandstorm]] grinder, found west of the Quarry. The amount of sand produced per sandstone varies, though it is more efficient (and time consuming) to grind smaller blocks of sandstone. This comes at the cost of 50gp per bucket of sand produced, and the player is required to supply their own (noted or un-noted) [[bucket]]s.

A player must have a [[Mining]] level of 35 or greater to mine sandstone, which yields the following experience depending on the size the sandstone block mined:
